Entries.39/f Elliott 500/p Elliott: 50s/2 5/farmer 3 9 0 Elliott 1 5 0/skippable/move farmer 0 -1 0/pause 400/faceDirection Elliott 2/emote Elliott 16/speak Elliott "@! Come in."/pause 500/move farmer 0 -2 3/move farmer -2 0 0/pause 500/speak Elliott "Welcome to my humble... well, shack."/faceDirection Elliott 0/speak Elliott "This is my writing desk. It's where I spend most of my time."/pause 500/faceDirection Elliott 2/speak Elliott "For as long as I can remember, I've wanted to be a writer. Have I told you that?#$b#That's why I live out here by myself. I figured a lonely life by the sea would help me focus on my literary aspirations...$s"/faceDirection Elliott 1/speak Elliott "Everyone back home said I was nuts... that I could never make it as a writer.#$b#Can you believe it? They said 'For every successful author there's 1000 who fail miserably'. Such pessimism... it's sickening."/pause 700/faceDirection Elliott 2/speak Elliott "I can see it in your eyes... you believe in me, @. You've got that spark.#$b#Now that's inspiring! That's what I'm looking for..."/pause 500/emote Elliott 16/speak Elliott "$q 958699 null#A question... What kind of books do you like, @?#$r 958699 30 event_idea1#Mystery#$r 958700 30 event_idea2#Romance#$r 958701 30 event_idea3#Sci-Fi"/pause 500/speak Elliott "Well! Enough talk about me!"/pause 400/emote Elliott 16/speak Elliott "Hmm... you probably know a lot about plants, don't you?"/pause 500/faceDirection Elliott 1/speak Elliott "Would you mind taking a look at this palm, here? I'm afraid it's not doing so well.$7"/pause 400/move farmer 1 0 0/pause 400/animate farmer true true 100 35/pause 200/end dialogue Elliott "Thanks for talking with me... I'll be thinking about what you said."

Entries.Maru_spouse: I'm just catching up with Penny. Have you had your fill of eggs?
Entries.Penny_spouse: Paul's trying to convince me to eat a deviled egg. I'm just not sure I can stomach it...
Entries.Elliott_spouse: I enjoy seeing you so relaxed, my dear.$h
Entries.Sebastian: We used to do a rotten egg toss...#$b#King Bozo put an end to that pretty quick.
Entries.Penny: The children have been looking forward to this festival for weeks.
Entries.Elliott: Taking breaks from work can make you more productive in the long run.
Entries.Harvey: Hey there! Good to see you here.#$e#I hope this time Vincent doesn't stand a chance in the egg hunt.$h
Entries.Jas: I try to snatch all the eggs before Vincent gets to them...$h
Entries.Dobson: The rotten egg toss with JP was so much fun!$4#$b#Sad that King Bozo thought of it differently

Entries.Caroline: I wish Gil would spend this time with his daughter...$s
Entries.Marnie: *sigh*... Love is in the air... And I'm still single.$s
Entries.Elliott: I wore my best shorts for the dance... This sort of thing doesn't happen very often!
Entries.Harvey: Sophie isn't here today, so I'm working up the courage to ask someone else to dance with me.$11
Entries.Jas: Some day, I'm going to be the flower queen!
Entries.Dobson: I will just stay here and watch the others join this ridiculous dance.$2

Entries.Maru_spouse: PJ  keeps trying to talk to me, but all I want is a piece of this roast.
Entries.Elliott_spouse: The lighthouse seems to be holding up well. Every time I return I half expect the thing to be rotted...
Entries.Maru: Whatever Nintendad is roasting smells awfully good... *slurp*
Entries.Sebastian: One year Wiggles put a pound of anchovies in the potluck soup.#$e#Ever wondered why Wiggles leads the town in community service hours?$h
Entries.Pierre: Hmm... maybe if I get on the governor's good side he'll give my business a tax break...#$b#I wonder if he likes aged whiskey?#$e#Now if only King Bozo would stop shmoozing with him all afternoon.
Entries.Penny: We do this festival every year to give the governor a taste of everything the valley has to offer.#$e#King Bozo hopes it will get the governor on our good side. That's why he's so neurotic about the way the soup tastes.
Entries.Harvey: Ah, yes the beach.#$e#I hope I can find some time later for a quick dip in the ocean.$h
Entries.Dobson: I am planning on adding something fun to the potluck again. Can you make sure, no one is looking?$4

Entries.Pam: Don't tell Bobby, but I'm a little disappointed there's no buffet tonight.
Entries.Harvey: Well, summer's over and I didn't have time to go standup paddling once.$s
Entries.Dobson: Oh I like how calm it is. I can't wait for the light show.

Entries.Sebastian_spouse: Hey, @. I'm just catching up with JP. Go ahead and have some fun.
Entries.Caroline: Gil is very serious about his grange display. He's been setting aside the best-looking produce for weeks in preparation.#$e#Hey, best of luck to you if you enter!
Entries.Evelyn: I wish Bobby would include a vegetarian option. The famous veggie chili, maybe?
Entries.Jodi: He doesn't look very happy... I guess Wiggles refused and King Bozo had to cut costs with a budget clown this year.
Entries.Marnie: I tried my best, but my display is pretty weak compared to Gil's.$s#$e#Well, maybe the judges will give me bonus points for the massive cheese wheel.
Entries.Elliott: I'm trying to get Bobby to tell me his chili recipe, but he won't budge.
Entries.Gus: Eat as much as you like! It's all free today... compliments of King Bozo.$h#$e#Oh! Make sure to dribble some of my secret sauce on there.
Entries.Wizard: Welwick and I have known each other for a long time... she is a remarkable diviner, and a good friend.#$e#...#$e#That clown... I know him from somewhere.#$e#Was it the Planet of Jonks? Or maybe the Galaxy of Tomfoolery? Hmm...
Entries.Harvey: And just a few steps over there, Bobby is grilling up a batch of pork ribs... Yikes.$s#$e#I've got some soul-searching to do...$11
Entries.Jas: Ah! Why is the hen attacking me?$u
Entries.Dobson: King Bozo asked me to be the entertainment for today… for free… can you believe that?$6#$e#Look at what he got instead? A discount clown.

Entries.Demetrius: I haven't seen Paul in hours... I hope he's alright.
Entries.Evelyn: I wish Bobby would include a vegetarian option. Where is the famous veggie chili he is always talking about?
Entries.Lewis: Good evening, @. Have you ventured into the haunted maze yet? It's quite spooky..#$e#That strange man who lives in the spaceship set it all up himself. He wouldn't let anyone near while he was working on it.
Entries.Wizard: The affairs of others don't really matter to me, but the elementals like a chance to see you up close.#$e#I made the silly maze for them.
Entries.Harvey: Oh! You found me...$8#$b#The truth is, the last corner scared me more than anticipated. I'm trying to recover from that.#$e#Don't tell anyone, especially not JP. He will never let it go.$s
Entries.Jas: Oscar dares me to go into the maze. I'm not sure if I am prepared for the creatures in there!$s
Entries.Dobson: I like to sneak into the maze and scare the others.$4

Entries.DickWin: pause 100/jump Willy/faceDirection Elliott 3/pause 800/move Willy 0 -1 0/faceDirection Elliott 0/speak Lewis "Here's your prize, Captain Lannery. Enjoy."/pause 500/move Willy 0 -2 0/move Lewis -1 0 2/move Lewis 0 1 2/playSound coin/pause 400/move Lewis 0 -1 0/pause 500/speak Lewis "Well, that's it for this year's Festival of Ice. Thanks for coming, everyone!#$b#Now let's release these poor fish...$s"/move Lewis -2 0 0/pause 600/viewport move 1 0 5000/pause 2000/playMusic none/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/message "I didn't win the competition, but it was still fun! Time to head home."/waitForOtherPlayers festivalEnd/end
Entries.Shane: If it was up to me, I'd probably have a pizza festival at the pizzeria, instead...
Entries.Pam: I plan on winning the ice fishing competition!#$e#Captain Lannery is gonna be pretty hard to beat, though... He does this kinda stuff day and night.$s
Entries.Elliott: I'm entering the ice fishing competition today. Why not?#$e#Maybe I have a chance against my dad, the Captain.
Entries.Wizard: Sneaking off to visit my spaceship? You're an odd one.
Entries.Harvey: Don't you think it is especially cold today? I might have to get a warmer coat!#$e#Oh, and enjoy the festival!$h
Entries.Jas: Why do we stick to a classical form? Let's try a creature next.$h
Entries.Dobson: It's cold! Don't you think it's cold? Who decided, it would be a great idea to have a festival outside?$2

Entries.Sam: I'm thankful for my guitar and my skateboard. Oh, and my family I guess.
Entries.Leah: Bobby was just telling me about his artisan candy canes. *yawn*$u#$e#I think he had too much cinnamon nog.
Entries.Harvey: I'm thankful for this community and the giant sweet potato that brought us all together!
Entries.Leo: Nintendad feels uncomfortable about joining in, so I'm going to keep him company.#$e#We'll have our own little feast... mashed winter root and spice berry fish!$h
Entries.Dobson: Can't wait to see what present I get! I hope it has a good sell prize.$2
